Article Title: Apple, Facebook may be hit with fines over breaching EU’s tech law
Article Text: Apple and Meta anticipate small fines for supposed violations of the EU's Digital Markets Act. The fines are expected to be up to 10% of global revenue. The EU aims to enforce compliance over punishment. Final decisions will be made this month. Potential fines are due to recent regulatory framework implementation in 2023.
Article Summary: Apple and Meta anticipate small fines for supposed violations of the EU's Digital Markets Act. The fines are expected to be up to 10% of global revenue. Final decisions will be made this month. Potential fines are due to recent regulatory framework implementation in 2023.

Article Title: Trump administration launches app for 'self-deportation' of illegal immigrants
Article Text:
What has changed in the ‘new’ app

US President Donald Trump’s administration has launched a mobile app that is designed to facilitate what officials call “self-deportation” for immigrants living in the US without legal status. The government says that the app strengthens the country’s mission to “secure the border by ensuring lawful entry for travelers and supporting effective enforcement.”The application, named “CBP Home,” has been developed by US Customs and Border Protection and includes a ‘Report Departure’ feature allowing undocumented immigrants to indicate their "intent to depart" the country voluntarily.“The app provides illegal aliens in the US with a straightforward way to declare their intent to voluntarily depart, offering them the chance to leave before facing harsher consequences. This reinforces our commitment to enforcing US laws and safeguarding national security,” said Pete Flores, Acting Commissioner, US Customs and Border Protection.Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem warned that “if they don't, we will find them, we will deport them, and they will never return.”The CBP Home App is available for download on Apple or Android devices as a free mobile application.With the CBP Home Mobile Application, travelers, businesses, and stakeholders will continue to gain access to a single digital solution that streamlines CBP processes, enhances security, and reduces administrative burdens – all from the convenience of a mobile device, CBP added.The new app replaces “CBP One,” which was launched during the Biden administration. The previous app allowed approximately one million migrants waiting in Mexico to schedule appointments to request entry at legal border crossings. Republican lawmakers had criticised this system, arguing it enabled mass migration without adequate vetting of applicants.President Trump terminated the CBP One program immediately after taking office, leaving many migrants with pending appointments uncertain about their status and next steps.The introduction of CBP Home aligns with other recent policy changes intended to pressure undocumented immigrants to leave the country. A forthcoming regulation, scheduled to take effect on April 11, will require individuals without legal status to register with the federal government or potentially face fines or imprisonment.
Article Summary: US Customs and Border Protection has launched a mobile app called 'CBP Home' The app allows undocumented immigrants to indicate their "intent to depart" the country voluntarily. The government says that the app strengthens the country’s mission to ‘secure the border’

Article Title: She was fired 8 years ago for ...: Facebook spokesperson on ex-employee who claims ex-COO Sheryl Sandberg spent $13,000 on lingerie during Europe trip
Article Text:
Meta spokesperson on claims made on Sheryl Sandberg in the book

How the book paints Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg



Former Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg allegedly spent $13,000 on lingerie for herself and her 26-year-old female assistant during a European trip , later inviting the assistant to “come to bed” on a private jet flight home, according to a revealing new memoir. These startling allegations reportedly come from 'Careless People: A Cautionary Tale of Power, Greed, and Lost Idealism', a book by Sarah Wynn-Williams , who worked at Facebook for six years before leaving in 2017, prior to the company’s rebranding as Meta. In her tell-all, Wynn-Williams claims that during a lengthy car journey across Europe, Sandberg and her assistant took turns resting in each other’s laps and running their fingers through each other’s hair. She also alleges that Sandberg directed her to buy lingerie for both of them, sparing no expense, resulting in a $13,000 tab, as noted in a New York Times book review published March 11.A Meta spokesperson dismissed the claims to The New York Post, calling them “a mix of outdated, previously reported assertions about the company and baseless accusations against our executives.” The spokesperson stated that Wynn-Williams was terminated eight years ago for poor performance and toxic behavior, adding that an internal investigation at the time found her harassment allegations to be misleading and unfounded. “Eight years ago, Sarah Wynn-Williams was fired for poor performance and toxic behavior, and an investigation at the time determined she made misleading and unfounded allegations of harassment.” The spokesperson added that “since then, she has been paid by anti-Facebook activists and this is simply a continuation of that work.”They further suggested that Wynn-Williams has since been compensated by anti-Facebook activists, framing the book as an extension of that agenda. “Whistleblower status protects government communications, not disgruntled activists trying to sell books,” the spokesperson remarked.In the memoir, Wynn-Williams also portrays CEO Mark Zuckerberg as evolving from a coding-obsessed engineer into a leader preoccupied with politics and public admiration, per the Times review. She recounts being tasked with arranging a crowd of over a million in Indonesia to “gently mob” Zuckerberg during an Asia tour. She also claims he once praised President Andrew Jackson—infamous for enacting the Indian Removal Act—as the greatest U.S. president because he “got stuff done.”The book, kept under wraps by its publisher until just before its Tuesday release, offers a sharp critique of Facebook’s leadership. Wynn-Williams portrays Sandberg and Zuckerberg as reckless and power-hungry, likening them to the “careless people” from The Great Gatsby—those who create chaos and leave others to deal with the aftermath.
Article Summary: Former Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg allegedly spent $13,000 on lingerie for herself and her 26-year-old female assistant during a European trip. These startling allegations reportedly come from 'Careless People: A Cautionary Tale of Power, Greed, and Lost Idealism', a book by Sarah Wynn-Williams. A Meta spokesperson dismissed the claims, calling them “a mix of outdated, previously reported assertions about the company and baseless accusations against our executives”

Article Title: Errol Musk reveals China’s plans to recruit Elon Musk’s 7-year-old half-brother; know who he is?
Article Text:
China plans to recruit Elliot Rush as the next big thing, reveals Errol Musk

Errol Musk sparks controversy over China’s interest in Elliot Rush



Who is Elliot Rush?



Also Read |

|

Errol Musk , father of Elon Musk , recently made headlines with sensational claims about his 7-year-old grandson, Elliot Rush . In an interview, Errol stated that China is attempting to recruit Elliot for an e-gaming tournament, a surprising assertion that has captured widespread attention. The claim not only raises questions about the potential influence of international politics on family matters but also highlights the growing prominence of competitive gaming on a global scale. Errol’s words have sparked curiosity and debate, adding a complex layer to the Musk family’s already highly publicised life.Errol Musk talked about China's reported interest in his grandson, Elliot Rush. He said that China believes Rush to be a likely gaming champion and wants to take him on for a tournament. Errol made a point of mentioning that Chinese officials have informed him that his grandson will be "the biggest thing in China" and that he is a "prolific gamer" and "a champion." That is why, in Errol's words, a Chinese businessman had even come to his South African ranch to consider the prospect.Remarkably, Errol was not quite as bothered as one might have expected about the political consequences of China's interest in his grandson, particularly given the tension in the relations between the United States and China. China is globally recognized as America's most influential adversary in international politics, making the issue likely to be even more complex. Nonetheless, the informal attitude and apparent non-concern regarding the issue of the subject during the interview were outstanding.Errol Musk's words have caused eyebrows to be raised both because of their surprising nature as well as the sensitive geopolitical matters they bring to light. The notion of China hiring a young child to play in a gaming tournament, particularly one that is related to the Musk family, brings an interesting convergence of personal family life, international politics, and the increasing visibility of competitive gaming. The controversy over Errol Musk's personal life and his comments about Elon's supposed child with Ashley St Clair also adds to the complexity of the issue.Elliot Rush is Elon Musk's 7-year-old half-brother and one of the youngest children of Errol Musk. He is the son of Errol and Jana Bezuidenhout, who was previously Errol's stepdaughter but is now his girlfriend. Jana, 38, is Heide Bezuidenhout's daughter, and Heide was Errol's second wife. The unconventional circumstances of their relationship, with Errol having adopted Jana at four years old before they had a child together when they were both 30 years old, has brought a lot of attention and raised eyebrows. The complicated family setup has drawn Elliot into the public eye and the media limelight.
Article Summary: Errol Musk made sensational claims about his 7-year-old grandson, Elliot Rush. In an interview, Errol stated that China is attempting to recruit Elliot for an e-gaming tournament. The claim not only raises questions about the potential influence of international politics on family matters but also highlights the growing prominence of competitive gaming.

Article Title: Apple supplier Foxconn unveils its first AI model for use in manufacturing
Article Text:
Foxconn’s AI model is trained on Nvidia chips and is based on Meta’s Llama

Foxconn , one of the world’s largest contract electronics manufacturers, has launched its inaugural large language model (LLM), “FoxBrain,” marking a significant step in the company's integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into its core operations.As per a report by news agency Reuters, the company plans to leverage FoxBrain to enhance efficiency in manufacturing and streamline supply chain management.FoxBrain was developed using 120 of Nvidia's H100 GPUs, completing the training process in approximately four weeks, the company said, adding that the model is built upon Facebook-parent Meta ’s Llama 3.1 architecture.Notably, FoxBrain is the first LLM in Taiwan specifically optimised for traditional Chinese and Taiwanese language styles, incorporating reasoning capabilities, the report said. Foxconn's internal testing indicates that while there is a minor performance difference compared to China's DeepSeek distillation model, FoxBrain's overall performance closely aligns with leading global standards, the company reportedly said.Initially, FoxBrain will be deployed for internal applications, encompassing data analysis, decision support, document collaboration, mathematical reasoning, problem-solving, and code generation. FFoxconn aims to expand the model's applications through collaborations with technology partners, sharing open-source information, and promoting AI adoption in manufacturing, supply chain management, and intelligent decision-making processes.Nvidia played a crucial role in the development of FoxBrain, providing support through its Taiwan-based supercomputer, “Taipei-1,” and offering technical consulting during the model's training phase. Taipei-1, the largest supercomputer in Taiwan, is owned and operated by Nvidia in Kaohsiung.Foxconn intends to provide further details about FoxBrain during Nvidia's upcoming GTC developer conference in mid-March.
Article Summary: FoxBrain is the first LLM in Taiwan specifically optimised for traditional Chinese and Taiwanese language styles. FoxBrain will be deployed for internal applications, encompassing data analysis, decision support, document collaboration, mathematical reasoning, problem-solving, and code generation. Foxconn intends to provide further details about FoxBrain during Nvidia's upcoming GTC developer conference in mid-March.

Article Title: NYT Connections hints and answers for today: March 9 puzzle solved
Article Text:
What is NYT’s ‘Connections’ game?

NYT Connections hints for March 9, 2025

Yellow: Computer input devices

Green: Building materials

Blue: Helpful deed

Purple: #1 songs from 1982

NYT Connections answers March 9, 2025

Yellow- Computer input devices – Microphone, Mouse, Scanner, Tablet

Green- Building materials – Brick, Concrete, Metal, Stone

Blue- Helpful deed – Favor, Kindness, Service, Solid

Purple- #1 songs from 1982 – Abracadabra, Centerfold, Mickey, Physical

How to play NYT Connections

You will receive a grid of 16 words.

Your goal is to sort these words into four groups of four based on their hidden connections.

Connections may include: Synonyms or antonyms.

Shared themes, such as objects, professions, or word families.

Wordplay or shared prefixes/suffixes.

A new puzzle is released daily at midnight.

You can play the puzzle on the New York Times website or app.

Look at the grid and identify words that seem related.

Experiment with grouping words that share a logical connection, such as names of mythical characters, clickable items, or objects used in a specific context.

Select four words you think belong together.

Click the "Submit" button to test your group.

If your group is correct, it will be locked in, and its category will be color-coded.

If incorrect, you lose a life.

You start with four lives.

Making four incorrect guesses ends the game.

Sometimes, the game provides a hint that you’re one word away from forming a correct group.

Use this to swap and refine your selections.

Correct groups are categorized as:Yellow: Easiest to guess.

Blue and Green: Moderate difficulty.

Purple: Hardest, often involving complex wordplay.

The game records your streaks and overall performance.

Challenge your friends or share results to see who solves the puzzles fastest.

If you run out of lives, the game ends.

Return the next day for a new puzzle and continue improving your skills!

Strategies for tackling NYT Connections puzzles

Identify Obvious Groups: Start with the most apparent connections, like mythology or objects with specific features.

Use Process of Elimination: Cross off words as you place them into groups, narrowing the possibilities for the remaining categories.

Think Creatively: Some categories require outside-the-box thinking, like interpreting word segments or understanding cultural references.

Learn from Mistakes: Each incorrect guess provides clues. Use these to refine your approach for future puzzles.

Other NYT games to sharpen your skills

NYT Mini Crossword: A quick yet challenging crossword experience.

Spelling Bee: Build as many words as possible using a set of seven letters.

Wordle: Solve a five-letter word puzzle with limited guesses.

Strands: A unique 6x8 word search that uses zig-zag solutions.

|

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle’s mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you’ve found yourself here, struggling to crack today’s challenge. As always, today’s NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don’t worry—we’re here to help. Below, you’ll find some helpful clues for today’s Wordle answer, and if those don’t do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it’s ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.In Wordle, the goal is to guess a new five-letter word each day, with up to six attempts to get it right.Wordle also tracks how many times you've played, along with your win or loss rate, as the game has become wildly popular for its winning streaks.Today’s Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Drumroll please, as we unveil the answer for Wordle.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can’t play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you’ll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.
Article Summary: Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five- letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. The New York Times acquired Wordle in February of this year.

What are NYT Strands and how to play the game?

Tips for solving NYT Strands puzzle

Identify the theme words: Fill in the grid with the theme words. Once found, they will be highlighted in blue and won't overlap with each other.

Find the Spangram: Identify the Spangram, a key part of the puzzle that connects two opposite sides of the grid. It encapsulates the theme and may consist of two words. The Spangram will be highlighted in yellow once you’ve located it.

Take advantage of hints: Pay attention to off-topic words for clues. For every three non-theme words you uncover, letters will be highlighted to give you a hint toward finding a theme word, without directly revealing it.

Also Read|

|

The New York Times published its inaugural crossword puzzle on February 15, 1942, in the Sunday Magazine. Created by Charles Erlenkotter and edited by Margaret Farrar, it was the first major newspaper to feature a crossword puzzle. Over the years, the NYT has introduced several beloved games, including the Mini Crossword in 2014, followed by Spelling Bee, Letter Boxed, and Tiles. In 2022, the NYT launched the wildly popular Wordle, followed by additional games like Connections and Strands.NYT Strands is the latest addition to its puzzle offerings. This engaging daily game presents players with new themes each day, challenging them to uncover all the words on the grid. One of the game’s highlights is the special Spangram, which stretches across two sides of the board. With its innovative approach to word puzzles, Strands quickly became a fan favorite, adding to the diverse and exciting puzzle lineup of the New York Times.Having trouble solving today’s NYT Strands puzzle? We’re here to help with some easy hints to fuel your curiosity even more. Plus, we’ve got today’s answer waiting for you – just keep reading.The theme for today’s Strands is ‘Kitty corner’Below, we’ve shared the hints, answers, and Spangram for today’s NYT Strands puzzle. The hints may give away part or all of the Strands, so proceed with caution. Scroll down to continue:CAT BEHAVIOR is the Spangram for today’s NYT Strands puzzle.Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of Connections, Spelling Bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the Spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.To play, connect letters on the grid to form words by dragging your mouse or fingers (on a touchscreen) in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions.Start by identifying the central theme word or Spangram, which will help you understand the puzzle’s theme.In addition to the Spangram, you must also find other words related to the theme hidden in the grid. Once you’ve uncovered them all, the puzzle is complete.
Article Summary: NYT Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of Connections, Spelling Bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. This engaging daily game presents players with new themes each day, challenging them to uncover all the words on the grid.

Article Title: How Jim Walker, the man who saw 2008 Stock Market crash coming, may have just 'agreed' with Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath's 'Stock Market Gyaan'
Article Text:
Jim Walker to investors: Take long-term investment approach

Jim Walker picks India over China

Indian stock markets witnessed Bears onslaught in the month of February, with the benchmark Sensex closing over 4,000 points lower. The carnage witnessed in the market during the month led to a staggering erosion of over Rs 40 lakh crore from the market capitalisation of BSE-listed companies; while Nifty 50 marked its longest losing streak since its inception in the year 1996. The relentless downward trend has left retail investors anxious. In a message to investors late earlier this week, Zerodha founder and CEO Nithin Kamath termed the fall as "the first real market correction " since Covid pandemic."Markets are cyclical, and given the way our markets went up from late 2020, this fall was inevitable," he said. Kamath told investors to not get carried away by the doom and gloom in the market and continue investing in SIPs. "I don't know how good the data is, but it seems like the number of investors stopping their SIPs has gone up. This is the wrong thing to do. What an SIP helps you do is to average your investments across different market cycles," he said.A similar sentiment comes from Jim Walker, a celebrated economist from Alethia Capital who famously foresaw the 2008 financial crisis. In an exclusive interaction with ETNow, Walker gave perspective on the current state of the global economy and what he thinks about India. Contrary to widespread concerns that today’s market exuberance might precipitate a collapse akin to that of 2008, Walker holds a different view.Speaking with ETNow, he acknowledged a global economic slowdown but stressed that the circumstances differ markedly from those preceding the financial debacle over ten years ago. Similar to Nithin Kamath, Walker batted for a long-term investment approach. Walker encouraged his clients to boost their stakes in India, despite valuation concerns in its stock market. “I’ve advised clients this week to significantly increase their investments in India. Though stock valuations raise eyebrows, I believe economic growth will soon justify them with strong corporate earnings,” he elaborated.Known for his prescient 2006-07 warning of a looming U.S. housing market crash, Walker remarked that today’s danger signals are less evident. “The signs were glaring in 2006-07 when we predicted a severe downturn driven by excesses in the property sector; it’s not the same now,” he said.He pointed out that unlike the lead-up to 2008, there are currently no significant overindulgences in the housing or financial sectors poised to spark a major banking crisis. Although certain areas show excessive stock market gains and asset price inflation, Walker believes these won’t lead to widespread corporate failures that could rattle the banking system. “We’re not seeing the kind of corporate collapses that impacted banks in 2008. That’s not on the horizon,” he observed.Additionally, Walker expressed a stronger preference for investing in India over China, suggesting it might be an opportune moment to increase investments there. He is especially sanguine about India’s prospects, citing its robust policy environment—the best in three decades—as a key factor enhancing its appeal to investors. “India’s policy stability and certainty are at their peak in the last 30 years,” he asserted, crediting solid monetary and fiscal policies along with exchange rate stability for bolstering India’s economic structure.He also praised the Indian government’s efforts in deregulation and improving business conditions, which he views as catalysts for future growth. By supporting small and medium enterprises, Walker believes India will spur further economic and job growth.
Article Summary: Jim Walker picks India over China as a good place to invest in the stock market. Walker is known for his prescient warning of a looming U.S. housing market crash in 2006-07. He believes there are no significant overindulgences in the housing or financial sectors poised to spark a major banking crisis.

Article Title: Apple launches MacBook Air with M4 chip, new colour, and a more affordable price
Article Text: Apple has launched the latest MacBook Air with the new M4 chip, offering improved performance and a new sky blue color option. The laptops, available in 13-inch and 15-inch models, start at Rs 99,900 in India, with lower prices for students. Pre-orders are open, with shipments beginning on March 12.
Article Summary: Apple launches MacBook Air with new M4 chip and sky blue color option. Laptops start at Rs 99,900 in India, with lower prices for students. Pre-orders are open, with shipments beginning on March 12. The laptops are available in 13-inch and 15-inch models.

Article Title: Elon Musk's one-word comment on Apple taking UK government to court
Article Text: Elon Musk has endorsed Apple's legal challenge against the UK government's demand for access to encrypted iCloud data. Apple has appealed the order, which they argue compromises user security, and has disabled its Advanced Data Protection feature for UK users in the meantime. The UK government insists it is balancing privacy and national security concerns.
Article Summary: Apple has appealed the order, which they argue compromises user security. Apple has disabled its Advanced Data Protection feature for UK users in the meantime. The UK government insists it is balancing privacy and national security concerns. Elon Musk has endorsed Apple's legal challenge against the UK government.

Article Title: Samsung rolls out One UI 7 beta to Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 devices
Article Text:
Samsung One UI 7 features

Samsung has announced the expansion of its Galaxy AI features to a wider range of devices through the One UI 7 beta program . The new update aims to deliver a more natural and seamless mobile AI experience for Galaxy users. As announced by the company, the beta program will be available for the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 in India, Korea, the U.K., and the U.S. starting March 6, with additional devices including the Galaxy S23 series, Tab S10 series, and A55 joining later in the month.Users can sign up for the beta program through the Samsung Members app, with the official One UI 7 update expected to roll out in April. One UI 7 introduces advanced AI agents with multimodal capabilities, enhancing the interface to provide a more intuitive and interactive mobile experience.Samsung's One UI 7 update introduces enhanced security features through the Knox Matrix system, offering a more transparent and user-friendly way to manage security across connected devices. The update includes a new Knox Matrix dashboard, allowing users to quickly check the security status of their Galaxy mobile devices, smart TVs, and home appliances. Devices marked ‘green’ are secure, while at-risk devices trigger alerts with actionable recommendations to fix potential threats.One UI 7 also simplifies data recovery with its Enhanced Data Protection feature. Users who lose access to a trusted device can securely transfer data stored on Samsung Cloud to a new device by verifying the lock screen method (pin, pattern, or password) of the old device.The update introduces passkey login for Samsung Accounts, providing a more secure and convenient authentication option. The Maximum Restrictions feature now offers additional network controls, including blocking 2G services and avoiding auto-reconnection to less secure Wi-Fi networks.To combat malicious apps, One UI 7’s Safe Install feature works with Auto Blocker to warn users about downloads from untrusted sources. The update also brings exclusive security features to Galaxy devices, adding to the Android suite of theft protection tools. The new Identity Check feature provides an extra layer of security if a device’s PIN is compromised, complementing existing tools like Theft Detection Lock, Offline Device Lock, and Remote Lock.
Article Summary: Samsung has announced the expansion of its Galaxy AI features to a wider range of devices through the One UI 7 beta program. The new update aims to deliver a more natural and seamless mobile AI experience for Galaxy users. The beta program will be available for the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 in India, Korea, the U.K., and theU.S. starting March 6.

Article Title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says ‘more proud of a…’ than ChatGPT maker’s team
Article Text:
Sam Altman gives update on GPT-4.5

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently posted on X (formerly Twitter) saying that, for him, even the biggest tech breakthroughs can't compare to a personal milestone: his newborn son learning how to eat. In the post, Altman wrote “very proud of the openai team for what is perhaps the most impressive scientific/technical breakthrough of recent decades…thought that was the thing i'd always be most proud of in life”. Adding further, he wrote “turns out i am now more proud of a preemie baby for learning how to eat on his own!”.In a follow-up post, Altman wrote “i realize i am getting neurochemically hacked here but idc, it's the best)”.Sam Altman welcomed his baby boy last month with his partner and software engineer Oliver Mulherin. The baby arrived prematurely and has been receiving care in the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU).In another news, the CEO shared an update about the company’s latest version of the large language model (LLM), GPT-4.5 . In an X post, Altman announced that GPT-4.5 is expected to roll out to ChatGPT Plus subscribers. However, he noted that the update will be a staggered rollout over several days to manage high demand and ensure a smooth user experience.Altman also explained that launching with a low rate limit would restrict usage and prevent users from having meaningful interactions with the new model. The staggered release will allow users to have longer conversations with GPT-4.5, even if it means some subscribers will have to wait a bit longer to access it.In his X announcement, Altman wrote: “We are likely going to roll out GPT-4.5 to the plus tier over a few days. There is no perfect way to do this; we wanted to do it for everyone tomorrow, but it would have meant we had to launch with a very low rate limit. We think people are gonna use this a lot and love it.”
Article Summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently posted on X (formerly Twitter) saying that, for him, even the biggest tech breakthroughs can't compare to a personal milestone: his newborn son learning how to eat. In an X post, Altman announced that GPT-4.5 is expected to roll out to ChatGPT Plus subscribers.

Article Title: YouTube scam warning: How hackers using AI video of CEO Neal Mohan to target people
Article Text:
Read YouTube's scam warning:

Phishing Campaign

Using Private Video Sharing

We’re aware that phishers have been sharing private videos to send false videos, including an AI generated video of YouTube’s CEO Neal Mohan announcing changes in monetization.

YouTube and its employees will never attempt to contact you or share information through a private video. If a video is shared privately with you claiming to be from YouTube, the video is a

phishing scam

. Do not click these links as the videos will likely lead to phishing sites that can install malware or steal your credentials. Never click on links in these videos and you can report the video by following these steps.

Many phishers actively target Creators by trying to find ways to impersonate YouTube by exploiting in-platform features to link to malicious content. Please always be aware and make sure not to open untrusted links or files!

Rob, TeamYouTube
Article Summary: YouTube is aware that phishers have been sharing private videos to send false videos. The videos will likely lead to phishing sites that can install malware or steal your credentials. Never click on links in these videos and you can report the video by following these steps.

Article Title: Income Tax officials may be able to access your email, Facebook, Instagram and other social media accounts starting FY2026-27 if they suspect ...
Article Text:
What is the new addition 'Virtual Digital Space' to the Income Tax Act

Come April 1 of Fiscal Year 2026-27, a new rule in the Income Tax Act law may grant the Income Tax department powers to access your social media accounts or emails in case they suspect tax evasion . Income Tax Bill 2025, which was introduced in the Parliament recently, will give Income Tax officials the legal authourity to access and inspect a wide range of personal and financial digital spaces, termed Virtual Digital Spaces in the bill. This means that the Income Tax department can break into social media accounts, personal emails, bank accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, and more if they have any reason to believe that you own any undisclosed income, money, Gold, Jewelry, or valuable item or property on which you haven’t paid applicable Income Tax.Presently, Section 132 of the Income Tax Act, 1961, allows Income Tax officials to seize assets and books during search operations if they find sufficient reasons to believe that an individual is in possession of undisclosed income or assets. The changes in the bill, once passed in the Parliament, will extend this authourity to the digital realm, allowing officials to bypass security measures on computer systems and virtual spaces.The Clause 247 of the Income Tax Bill outlines this expanded power, stating that officers can “break open the lock of any door, box, locker, safe, almirah, or other receptacle” or “gain access by overriding the access code” to computer systems or virtual digital spaces when access is otherwise unavailable. This applies if they believe an individual possesses undisclosed income or assets taxable under the law.According to the bill, the term Virtual Digital Space includes email servers, social media accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, banking accounts, and any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset. It further adds that virtual digital space is an environment, area or realm that is constructed and experienced through computer technology and not the physical, tangible world, which encompasses any digital realm that allows users to interact, communicate and perform activities using computer systems, computer networks, computer resources, communication devices, cyberspace, internet, worldwide web and emerging technologies, using data and information in the electronic form for creation, storage or exchange and includes:* Email servers* Social media account* Online investment account, trading account, banking account, etc* Any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset* Remote server or cloud servers* Digital application platforms* Any other space of similar natureAs to who all can wield this authority? The bill designates “authorised officers” as senior tax officials, including Joint Directors, Additional Directors, Joint Commissioners, Additional Commissioners, Assistant or Deputy Directors, Assistant or Deputy Commissioners, Income Tax Officers, and Tax Recovery Officers.What does this mean for individuals? The new rules significantly widen the scope of tax investigations, giving officials the ability to probe deeply into personal and financial digital footprints. As this provision takes effect, it raises questions about privacy and the balance between tax enforcement and individual rights.
Article Summary: Income Tax Bill 2025 will give Income Tax officials the legal authourity to access and inspect a wide range of personal and financial digital spaces. This includes email servers, social media accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, banking accounts, and any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset.

Article Title: GTA 6 launch: Rockstar confirms GTA 6 release window as fans anticipate trailer 2
Article Text:
GTA 6: Confirmation of release timeline







GTA 6: Anticipation for trailer 2

GTA 6: Speculation and leaks

GTA 6: Celebrity involvement and pre-orders

Rockstar Games has officially confirmed the release timeline for Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA 6), setting the stage for an autumn 2025 launch. This announcement has fueled speculation about the imminent release of the second trailer, as fans eagerly await more details about the highly anticipated game.During a recent earnings call, Take-Two Interactive, Rockstar's parent company, reaffirmed that GTA 6 is on track for a fall 2025 release. This confirmation comes after months of speculation and excitement following the first trailer's release in December 2023. The game is expected to be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.Fans are closely monitoring Rockstar's activities for any hints about the second trailer. The company recently reduced its Instagram posts to 12, a move that has historically preceded significant announcements. This has led to widespread speculation that Rockstar is preparing for the next phase of GTA 6 marketing. Community discussions suggest that the second trailer could provide further details on gameplay mechanics, map design, and new features.The gaming community is abuzz with theories and leaks about what the second trailer might reveal. Some speculate that the game will feature an interactive ecosystem similar to Red Dead Redemption 2, with notable wildlife mechanics. There are also rumours about the introduction of new vehicles, a second city, and dual protagonists inspired by Bonnie and Clyde.Adding to the excitement, WWE star John Cena recently shared the official GTA 6 artwork on his Instagram, sparking theories about a potential cameo in the game or an upcoming announcement. Meanwhile, a gaming retailer in Malaysia has reportedly begun accepting pre-orders for GTA 6, even before Rockstar has announced an exact release date. This early availability of reservations hints at increasing confidence in the projected 2025 release window.
Article Summary: Rockstar Games has confirmed the release timeline for Grand Theft Auto VI. The game is expected to be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. This announcement has fueled speculation about the imminent release of the second trailer. The gaming community is abuzz with theories and leaks about what the second Trailer might reveal.

Article Title: Apple Mac Studio with M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips launched as ‘the most powerful Mac ever’
Article Text:
Mac Studio price and availability

Mac Studio with M4 Max features

Mac Studio with M4 Max enables:

Up to 1.6x faster image processing in Adobe Photoshop when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 2.9x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 2.1x faster build performance when compiling code in Xcode when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 3.1x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 1.2x faster ProRes transcode performance in Compressor when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 2.8x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 1.6x faster video processing performance in Topaz Video AI when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 5x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Mac Studio with M3 Ultra features

Mac Studio with M3 Ultra enables:

Up to 16.9x faster token generation using an LLM with hundreds of billions of parameters in LM Studio when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, thanks to its massive amounts of unified memory.

Up to 2.6x faster scene rendering performance in Maxon Redshift when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 6.4x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X.

Up to 1.1x faster basecalling for DNA sequencing in Oxford Nanopore MinKNOW when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 21.1x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X.

Up to 1.4x faster 8K video rendering performance in Final Cut Pro when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 4x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X

Apple today announced the new Mac Studio, featuring the M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips. The desktop computer offers improved performance, enhanced connectivity with Thunderbolt 5, and new features in a compact design. It is designed for professional users who require high performance for demanding workloads.Apple says that the Mac Studio is capable of running large language models with over 600 billion parameters in memory, thanks to its GPU and up to 512GB of unified memory with the M3 Ultra chip . It also supports Apple Intelligence, a system aimed at improving productivity while maintaining privacy. The new Mac Studio is available for pre-order, with availability beginning March 12.“The new Mac Studio is the most powerful Mac we’ve ever made,” said John Ternus, Apple’s senior vice president of Hardware Engineering. “A complete game-changer for pros around the world — powering both home and pro studios — Mac Studio sits in a class of its own, offering a staggering amount of performance in a compact, quiet design that fits beautifully on your desk. With this new Mac Studio, we’re delivering even more extreme performance with M4 Max and M3 Ultra, support for half a terabyte of unified memory, up to 16TB of superfast storage, and Thunderbolt 5 connectivity. Mac Studio truly is the ultimate pro desktop.”Mac Studio comes at a starting price of Rs 2,14,900 in India. For education, it can be purchased for Rs 1,94,900. Additional configure-to-order options are available at apple.com/in/store.Customers can pre-order the new Mac Studio starting March 5 on apple.com/in/store and in the Apple Store app. It will begin arriving to customers, and will be in Apple Store locations and Apple Authorized Resellers, starting March 12.The Mac Studio with M4 Max is designed for professionals such as video editors, developers, and creative users. It features a 16-core CPU, a 40-core GPU, and a faster Neural Engine, providing significant performance gains over previous models. The M4 Max also supports up to 128GB of unified memory and includes a Media Engine for improved video processing.Mac Studio with M4 Max starts at 36GB of unified memory, with support for up to 128GB. Apple claims that Mac Studio with M4 Max is up to 3.5x faster than Mac Studio with M1 Max, and is up to 6.1x faster than the most powerful Intel-based 27-inch iMac.The M3 Ultra version offers a 32-core CPU, an 80-core GPU, and a 32-core Neural Engine. It supports up to 512GB of unified memory and 16TB of SSD storage. The M3 Ultra is built for demanding workflows, offering nearly double the performance of the M4 Max in certain tasks.It also offers an up to 80-core GPU, more than any Apple silicon chip; a powerful 32-core Neural Engine for on-device AI and machine learning (ML); and a high-bandwidth memory architecture that delivers over 800GB/s of unified memory bandwidth.The new Mac Studio includes Thunderbolt 5 ports with transfer speeds up to 120 Gb/s, enabling faster external storage and expansion options. Additional connectivity includes a 10Gb Ethernet port, HDMI, and an SDXC card slot, along with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.Apple Intelligence tools, integrated into Mac Studio, include Writing Tools, Priority Notifications, live transcription in Notes, and new Siri improvements. These features aim to enhance productivity for professional users.
Article Summary: Apple announces new Mac Studio, featuring the M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips. The desktop computer offers improved performance, enhanced connectivity with Thunderbolt 5, and new features in a compact design. Mac Studio comes at a starting price of Rs 2,14,900 in India. For education, it can be purchased for Rs 1,94,900.

Article Title: Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak on why he not for AI
Article Text: Steve Wozniak has raised concerns about the misuse of AI at the Mobile World Congress, warning of its potential for deception. He criticized Elon Musk’s leadership style for lacking compromise and criticised Big Tech for dominating our lives through subscriptions. Wozniak emphasized his distrust of the 'artificial' aspect of AI.
Article Summary: Steve Wozniak has raised concerns about the misuse of AI at the Mobile World Congress. He criticized Elon Musk’s leadership style for lacking compromise and criticised Big Tech for dominating our lives through subscriptions. He emphasized his distrust of the 'artificial' aspect of AI.

Article Title: Apple pulls ad that showcased ‘personalised Siri’ functions after delay announcement
Article Text: Apple has pulled an advertisement for the iPhone 16 featuring an unreleased Siri functionality after confirming the feature will not be available soon. The ad, which originally aired in September, showcased actress Bella Ramsey using Siri's advanced capabilities to retrieve information from on-device data. Apple cites the complexity of developing this contextual query technology, delaying its release to 2026.
Article Summary: The ad featured actress Bella Ramsey using Siri's advanced capabilities to retrieve information from on-device data. Apple cites the complexity of developing this contextual query technology, delaying its release to 2026. The ad, which originally aired in September, showcased Ramsey using the Siri feature.

Article Title: Elon Musk's DOGE deploys GSAi chatbot, may replace some government workforce with them
Article Text: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency introduced GSAi, a chatbot, to 1,500 federal workers at the General Services Administration to streamline tasks and reduce staff. The chatbot provides drafting and summarizing assistance but has constraints on sensitive information. Amid layoffs, the initiative aims for efficiency, with further deployment expected across the agency.
Article Summary: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency introduced GSAi to 1,500 federal workers at the General Services Administration. The chatbot provides drafting and summarizing assistance but has constraints on sensitive information. Amid layoffs, the initiative aims for efficiency, with further deployment expected across the agency.

Article Title: Why and how Elon Musk's SpaceX is lobbying FCC to block iPhone satellite provider Globalstar
Article Text:
What SpaceX said about blocking iPhone satellite provider Globalstar’s launch



“Doing so would be the fairest and most expeditious route to determine the appropriate regulatory regime to govern operations in a band that has not been examined in nearly 20 years.”

Why SpaceX is trying to block Globalstar’s launch



“Accepting Globalstar’s application for its new, higher-power system in the band would also fundamentally alter the spectrum environment in the 1.6/2.4 GHz band to the detriment of prospective competitors, such as SpaceX, whose applications predated Globalstar’s application and who have expressed an interest in efficiently sharing the band alongside other operators.”
Article Summary: “Doing so would be the fairest and most expeditious route to determine the appropriate regulatory regime to govern operations in a band that has not been examined in nearly 20 years.” “Accepting Globalstar’s application for its new, higher-power system in the band would also fundamentally alter the spectrum environment in the 1.6/2.4 GHz band to the detriment of prospective competitors, such as SpaceX,” the company said.

Article Title: NASA astronaut Butch Wilmore on why he and his crewmate are still in space 9 months longer than planned: From my standpoint, politics …
Article Text: NASA astronaut Butch Wilmore clarified that politics are not responsible for the extended stay he and Sunita Williams are experiencing on the International Space Station. The delay results from technical issues with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft. Wilmore and Williams are now expected to return to Earth in late March via SpaceX's Crew Dragon.
Article Summary: Butch Wilmore says politics are not responsible for the extended stay he and Sunita Williams are experiencing. The delay results from technical issues with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft. Wilmore and Williams are now expected to return to Earth in late March via SpaceX's Crew Dragon.

Article Title: The little-known tech company that is said to be helping to track abortion pill prescriptions in America
Article Text:
Representative Image

What Bamboo Health said about tracking abortion pills



“They determine how that data is managed and accessed. That's how it gets treated in Louisiana and anywhere else it would occur,”

How this abortion pill tracking can affect users



A tech company named Bamboo Health is reportedly playing a key role in tracking abortion pill prescriptions in parts of America, starting with the state of Louisiana. This tracking is enabled by state laws that are beginning to classify abortion pills, specifically mifepristone and misoprostol , as " controlled substances ," similar to drugs with high potential for abuse. In May 2024, Louisiana passed such a law and is now using Bamboo Health's existing prescription monitoring database to track these medications.A report by Business Insider cited New Orleans Health Department to claim that as of March, Louisiana clinicians are mandated to log every prescription for mifepristone and misoprostol into Bamboo Health's database. This system, typically used for monitoring addictive drugs, is now being applied to abortion pills in Louisiana and potentially other states.In a statement to Business Insider, a former Bamboo employee revealed that the company had announced its plan to monitor the drugs in an internal Slack channel in 2024. At that time the company reportedly cited this move as its legal obligation as Louisiana’s prescription-monitoring vendor. The employee, who discussed the matter on the condition of anonymity, described the announcement as part of the company's compliance measures.In a separate statement to Business Insider, Bamboo Health CEO Jeff Smith said that the company's prescription monitoring platform is required to adhere to state regulations .Smith noted.Originally founded as Appriss in 1994, Bamboo Health, grew from a victim notification tool into a $30 million business. It later expanded into law enforcement solutions, tracking sex offenders and monitoring Sudafed purchases to help police shut down meth labs.Apart from Louisiana, other states like Texas, Indiana, and Idaho are also exploring similar measures for tracking these drugs. All three states even have partnerships with Bamboo, the report added.Its also important to note that beyond abortions, Misoprostol is used for various medical purposes, including treating ulcers, managing miscarriages, and preventing postpartum bleeding. However, its classification as a controlled substance has raised concerns among physicians about restrictions and state oversight potentially affecting patient care.
Article Summary: A tech company named Bamboo Health is reportedly playing a key role in tracking abortion pill prescriptions in parts of America, starting with the state of Louisiana. This tracking is enabled by state laws that are beginning to classify abortion pills, specifically mifepristone and misoprostol, as " controlled substances"

Article Title: Mark Zuckerberg’s UFC flex: A look at his Rs 2.62 crore Rolex, new Ray-Ban Meta glasses
Article Text:
Previous sightings of Zuckerberg’s high-profile watches

Mark Zuckerberg reveals the company's latest smart glasses

Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg was spotted sporting a high-end Rolex timepiece at a UFC match in Las Vegas this weekend. The sighting adds to a growing list of expensive timepieces he has been seen wearing in recent months. The Facebook founder also shared his pictures with his wife wearing Meta’s new Ray-Ban smart glasses .Zuckerberg attended the UFC event on Saturday (March 8), and in his Instagram posts as well as videos shared on X by the general public, he was seen talking to Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili – the current UFC Bantamweight Champion.While Zuckerberg was greeting him, his distinctive yellow gold watch featuring a black dial and three white subdials was seen, complementing his otherwise minimalist attire – a black T-shirt, khaki cargo pants, black sunglasses and a thick gold chain.According to watch experts (via Business Insider), the timepiece is a yellow gold Rolex Daytona “Le Mans.” Ng Yong Shen, a vice president at Dubai-based secondhand luxury retailer Re-Loved Luxury, estimated the watch's resale value to be approximately $300,000 (approximately 2.62 crore).In January, he was seen wearing a Greubel Forsey Hand Made 1, a rare and highly coveted watch with a price tag exceeding $900,000 (nearly Rs 8 crore), while announcing the end of Meta's fact-checking partnerships in the US. Greubel Forsey reportedly produces only two to three of these watches annually.In September, Zuckerberg showcased a rose gold De Bethune DB 25 Starry Varius during an interview on the business podcast “Acquired,” a watch valued around $90,000 (approx Rs 79 lakh) and $95,700.Zuckerberg also unveiled “the new limited edition Ray-Ban Meta x Coperni frames.” He shared a photo in his Instagram Channel, donning the news smart glasses. This release follows Meta's recent teaser about "an exciting collaboration" coming soon. The frames feature a translucent design similar to Meta's previous limited editions.According to a newly published Meta blog post, the Ray-Ban Meta x Coperni smart glasses will be available at a price of $549. The company has also released additional images showcasing the translucent design of these premium frames.
Article Summary: Mark Zuckerberg was spotted sporting a high-end Rolex timepiece at a UFC match in Las Vegas this weekend. The sighting adds to a growing list of expensive timepieces he has been seen wearing in recent months. The Facebook founder also shared his pictures with his wife wearing Meta’s new Ray-Ban smart glasses.

Article Title: Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic faces delay, here's the latest update shared by Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari
Article Text:
Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic delayed due to script development

“We’re still writing that. It’s taking far too long, but I would love to tell their story,”

Balancing directorial and production responsibilities

“I’m producing a few films. We now have a tie-up with Tips. Ramesh (Taurani) ji’s daughter Jaya was the one who wanted me to partner with them,”

Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic on hold as director aims for perfection

“No one knows what’s working. We need to question ourselves as to how willing we are to tell fearless stories that are commercially viable at the same time.”

Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari keeps Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic details under wraps

When will Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy release

Acclaimed filmmaker Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari , known for her successful films such as Bareilly Ki Barfi, Nil Battey Sannata, and Panga, had announced a biopic on Infosys founder Narayana Murthy and philanthropist-author Sudha Murthy several years ago. The film, which aims to showcase the inspiring journey of one of India’s most influential entrepreneurial couples, has been highly anticipated by audiences. However, despite the initial announcement, the biopic has faced multiple delays. In a recent interview with News18, the director finally addressed the delay and provided insights into the current status of the project. She also spoke about her other film ventures and the evolving landscape of filmmaking.During an interview with News18 Showsha, Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari confirmed that the biopic is still in the writing stage and emphasized that crafting a story of such magnitude takes time. She acknowledged the lengthy development process but assured that the project remains a priority.she said. The director’s statement indicates that the biopic is undergoing an extensive research and scripting phase to ensure that it accurately portrays the lives and achievements of Narayana Murthy and Sudha Murthy.Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari further explained that she is currently focusing on her production ventures before taking on the directorial responsibilities of the biopic. As per reports, she revealed that she has partnered with Tips Industries for multiple projects and is involved in several films as a producer.she shared. This unexpected collaboration has surprised many in the industry, as such partnerships are typically seen between male executives. She highlighted the significance of this collaboration as a step toward fostering inclusivity and empowering women in filmmaking.While discussing the Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic, the filmmaker emphasized that her primary goal is not just to create a commercially successful film but to craft a narrative that resonates deeply with audiences.She explained,This suggests that Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari is focusing on a high-quality cinematic experience that does justice to the legacy of Narayana and Sudha Murthy, rather than rushing the project for box office returns.While Ashwiny has shared updates on the biopic’s progress, specific details about the film’s cast, storyline, and production timeline remain undisclosed. Given the historical significance of Narayana Murthy’s role in shaping India’s IT industry and Sudha Murthy’s contributions to literature and philanthropy, fans are eagerly awaiting a well-researched and impactful portrayal of their lives.As the film is still in its pre-production stage, a release date has not been announced. The delay suggests that the filmmakers are taking the necessary time to ensure that the biopic is accurate, compelling, and true to its subjects.While the wait continues, audiences can look forward to Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari’s upcoming production ventures, as she remains committed to telling meaningful and diverse stories.
Article Summary: Narayana Murthy-Sudha Murthy biopic delayed due to script development. Filmmaker Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari is currently focusing on her production ventures before taking on the directorial responsibilities of the biopic. She has partnered with Tips Industries for multiple projects and is involved in several films as a producer.

Article Title: Starlink fight for Ukraine: Angry Elon Musk to Polish foreign minister Radoslaw Sikorski, 'Be quiet, small man. You pay ...'
Article Text:
Elon Musk tells Radoslaw Sikorsk to keep quite

Poland PM cautions 'friends'

US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Elon Musk clashed publicly with Polish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski over Starlink. The public spat started after Radoslaw Sikorski claimed that Poland pays for Ukraine to use the services of Starlink, which provides crucial internet connectivity to Kyiv and its military. He further went on to claim that Elon Musk is planning to shut down Starlink terminals in Ukraine. This irked both US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Starlink CEO Elon Musk. The duo sharply responded to Sikorski, dismissing Sikorski's concerns about Starlink being cut off. US Secretary accused Poland's foreign minister of "making things up".Rubio went on to suggest Ukraine as ungrateful, in a strong rebuke and that Ukraine may need an alternative to Elon Musk's Starlink satellite service if it becomes unreliable. He also urged Ukraine to be thankful for the assistance thus far. "No one has made any threats about cutting Ukraine off from Starlink," Rubio said. "And say thank you because without Starlink, Ukraine would have lost this war long ago and Russians would be on the border with Poland right now."Sikorski retaliated by saying that Poland will look for alternative suppliers if SpaceX turns out to be an unreliable provider of Starlink satellite internet for Ukraine, as per The Kyiv Independent.Elon Musk, too, responded, claiming that Poland only pays a "small fraction" of the cost for Ukraine's Starlink access. "Be quiet, small man. You pay a tiny fraction of the cost," Musk said. "And there is no substitute for Starlink." Musk warned that the entire front line in Ukraine would collapse if he shut off Starlink services.Earlier, iIn a post on Twitter, Elon Musk said that that no matter how much he disagreed on Ukraine policy, Starlink would never turn off its terminals. "Exactly! To be extremely clear, no matter how much I disagree with the Ukraine policy, Starlink will never turn off its terminals. I am simply stating that, without Starlink, the Ukrainian lines would collapse, as the Russians can jam all other communications! We would never do such a thing or use it as a bargaining chip," wrote Elon Musk.After the open dispute, Poland's prime minister urged "friends" to respect their allies and avoid arrogance. His Twitter post, which didn't name anyone directly, came a day after a heated social media exchange between top US and Polish officials over Starlink. "True leadership means respect for partners and allies. Even for the smaller and weaker ones," Prime Minister Donald Tusk wrote in English on X. "Never arrogance. Dear friends, think about it."
Article Summary: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Starlink CEO Elon Musk clashed publicly with Polish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski over Starlink. The public spat started after Sikorsk claimed that Poland pays for Ukraine to use the services of Starlink, which provides crucial internet connectivity to Kyiv and its military. Musk warned that the entire front line in Ukraine would collapse if he shut off Starlink services.

Article Title: Microsoft's new AI sales agents automate sales process from leads to closing
Article Text: Microsoft announced two new AI sales agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot aimed at transforming revenue operations for businesses. The agents, available in public preview this May, will integrate with both Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Salesforce CRM systems.The Sales Agent autonomously converts contacts into qualified leads by researching prospects, scheduling meetings, and engaging with customers around the clock. For simpler transactions, it can even complete sales independently. The agent personalizes interactions by accessing CRM data, company resources, web information, and Microsoft 365 communications.Complementing this, Sales Chat accelerates sales cycles by providing actionable insights from various data sources. Representatives can receive risk assessments for deals, meeting preparations, and strategic plans through natural language prompts, eliminating the need to navigate CRM interfaces directly.Microsoft reports widespread adoption, with nearly 70% of Fortune 500 companies utilizing Copilot and over 400,000 custom agents created last quarter using Microsoft Copilot Studio . Success stories include Vodafone, which projects doubling or tripling its proposal response capacity, and Campari Group, which reduced marketing copy costs by 18%.ANS CEO Richard Thompson noted a 133% year-over-year revenue increase per sales representative after migrating from Salesforce to Dynamics 365 Sales, with an additional 30 minutes saved daily and 20% increased pipeline generation after implementing Microsoft 365 Copilot.To support adoption, Microsoft is launching the AI Accelerator for Sales program on April 1, offering expertise in CRM migration, seller adoption, and AI agent customization.
Article Summary: The Sales Agent autonomously converts contacts into qualified leads by researching prospects, scheduling meetings, and engaging with customers around the clock. The agent personalizes interactions by accessing CRM data, company resources, web information, and Microsoft 365 communications. Sales Chat accelerates sales cycles by providing actionable insights from various data sources.

Article Title: Google has 'quietly removed' mentions of ‘diversity’ and ‘equity’ from the mission description page of responsible AI team
Article Text: Google has quietly updated the webpage for its Responsible AI and Human Centered Technology (RAI-HCT) team, removing mentions of "diversity" and "equity" from the mission description. This change was first highlighted by The Midas Project, a non-profit watchdog group, and has sparked discussions about the company's commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives.The previous version of the RAI-HCT team's webpage included language such as "marginalized communities," "diverse," "underrepresented groups," and "equity" to describe the team's work. These terms have now been replaced with less specific wording, such as "all," "varied," and "numerous." The changes come after Google recently removed similar language from its Startups Founders Fund grant website and announced plans to eliminate its diversity hiring targets and review its DEI programs.This move aligns with a broader trend among major tech companies, including Amazon, Meta, and OpenAI, which have also scaled back their DEI initiatives in response to the Trump Administration's stance on what it characterises as "illegal" practices. The administration has targeted DEI programs, leading several companies to reconsider their approaches.Google has not yet responded to requests for comment on the changes. However, the removal of these terms from Google's Responsible AI team's mission description raises questions about the future of diversity and equity efforts within the company.
Article Summary: Google has quietly updated the webpage for its Responsible AI and Human Centered Technology (RAI-HCT) team. It has removed mentions of "diversity" and "equity" from the mission description. This change has sparked discussions about the company's commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives.
